column1: #text=I decided to borrow some books from the library .
#text=I went to the library and started looking on the shelves .
#text=There were so many good books that it was difficult to pick out just a few , so I used the library 's computer book search program .
#text=Eventually I chose several modern plays , a biography , and a book on ancient Rome .
#text=I took these books up to the librarian 's desk and asked if I could check them out .
#text=She said yes , I could borrow the books , but I needed to sign up for a library card .
#text=I filled out the form , and she took it .
#text=Then she made my library card and gave it to me .
#text=With this accomplished , I was able to check out my books .
#text=She put a card in each one with a date stamped on it .
#text=This was the date the books were due to be returned .
#text=I promised to return them on time and took the books home to read .
